#[pin_project::pin_project(PinnedDrop)]
        pub struct $StructName<$($F,)+>
        where
            $($F: Stream,)+
        {
            done: bool,
            output: $mod_name::Output<$($F,)+>,
            state: PollArray<{ $mod_name::LEN }>,
            wakers: WakerArray<{ $mod_name::LEN }>,
            $( #[pin] $F: $F,)+

        }
